panels.description: Percentage of executor tasks that run concurrently without being blocked indicating execution parallelism efficiency

targets.expr: increase(avalanche_qCNyZHrs3rZX458wPJXPJJypPf6w423A84jnfbdP2TPEmEE9u_vm_chain_chain_executor_build_executable{chain=~"$chainID", node_id=~"$nodeID", network_uuid=~"$networkID"}[5m]) / (increase(avalanche_qCNyZHrs3rZX458wPJXPJJypPf6w423A84jnfbdP2TPEmEE9u_vm_chain_chain_executor_build_executable{chain=~"$chainID", node_id=~"$nodeID", network_uuid=~"$networkID"}[5m]) + increase(avalanche_qCNyZHrs3rZX458wPJXPJJypPf6w423A84jnfbdP2TPEmEE9u_vm_chain_chain_executor_build_blocked{chain=~"$chainID", node_id=~"$nodeID", network_uuid=~"$networkID"}[5m])) * 100

increase(avalanche_qCNyZHrs3rZX458wPJXPJJypPf6w423A84jnfbdP2TPEmEE9u_vm_chain_chain_executor_verify_executable{chain=~"$chainID", node_id=~"$nodeID", network_uuid=~"$networkID"}[5m]) / (increase(avalanche_qCNyZHrs3rZX458wPJXPJJypPf6w423A84jnfbdP2TPEmEE9u_vm_chain_chain_executor_verify_executable{chain=~"$chainID", node_id=~"$nodeID", network_uuid=~"$networkID"}[5m]) + increase(avalanche_qCNyZHrs3rZX458wPJXPJJypPf6w423A84jnfbdP2TPEmEE9u_vm_chain_chain_executor_verify_blocked{chain=~"$chainID", node_id=~"$nodeID", network_uuid=~"$networkID"}[5m])) * 100

panels.description:
Shows the average time taken to parse blocks by the MeterChainVM.

Spikes may indicate VM-level slowness, resource pressure, or unusual transaction loads.
panels.title: Average Parse Block Time

panels.description:
Shows the average time taken to build blocks by the MeterChainVM.

Spikes may indicate VM-level slowness, resource pressure, or unusual transaction loads.
panels.title: Average Build Block Time

panels.description:
Shows the average time taken to verify blocks by the MeterChainVM.

Spikes may indicate VM-level slowness, resource pressure, or unusual transaction loads.
panels.title: Average Verify Block Time

panels.description:
Shows the average time taken to accept blocks by the MeterChainVM.

Spikes may indicate VM-level slowness, resource pressure, or unusual transaction loads.
panels.title: Average Accept Block Time

panels.description:
Shows the average time taken to reject blocks by the MeterChainVM.

Spikes may indicate VM-level slowness, resource pressure, or unusual transaction loads.
panels.title: Average Reject Block Time

panels.description:
Shows the average time taken to get a blocks by the MeterChainVM.

Spikes may indicate VM-level slowness, resource pressure, or unusual transaction loads.
panels.title: Average Get Block Time
